column4: how do I move a window to another workspace in unity? In 10.10 I'd just right-click->move to workspace X
right click the app title bar
mmm, I just tried it on Xchat title bar, and I have a selection of move to another workspace, and has a choice of 2,3,4
if the app is full screen, then click the 3rd icon on the left of the title bar to come off full screen, then you should be able to right click the apps title bar
on the left of the title bar you have a red x, a minus and a squarre,,, click the square to come out of full screen

I know how to get out of full screen mode (I prefer double-rightclick), I just find it really odd that I have to do that to move it to another workspace, ideally I'd be able to drag it but maybe that's asking too much
I just tried the drag method it works, but only if the app is windowed
guess I'll just stick to single-workspace mode
also, is there any hack out yet to move the damn 'unitybar'? I have a 4 screen setup + synergy. now the bar is in the middle of my screens and hard to 'activate'
click on the workspace switcher, then drag the windowed app across to a workspace,, it works for me that way too
ah thanks usalabs, still seems a bit too hard for such a trivial task, but that's nicer
you can also use the same method for full screen apps too
thanks a lot, that's how i want it ;-)
